text: Atanasije Jevtić (Serbian Cyrillic: Атанасије Јевтић; 8 January 1938 – 4 March 2021) was a Serbian Orthodox prelate. He was the bishop of Banat from 1991 until 1992, and the bishop of Zahumlje and Herzegovina from 1992 until his retirement in 1999. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Serbian Orthodox priests
title: Atanasije Jevtić
